dependent_to.description:
The Biopieces are a collection of bioinformatics tools that can be
pieced together in a very easy and flexible manner to perform both
simple and complex tasks.
dependent_to.name: biopieces

dependent_to.description:
This project seeks to develop a single piece of open-source, expandable
software to fill the bioinformatics needs of the microbial ecology
community.
dependent_to.name: mothur

dependent_to.description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.
dependent_to.name: py-shortbred

dependent_to.description:
Rapid and accurate taxonomic classification of short paired-end sequence
reads from the 16S ribosomal RNA gene
dependent_to.name: rtax

dependent_to.description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.
dependent_to.name: shortbred

description:
USEARCH is a unique sequence analysis tool with thousands of users
world-wide. Note: A manual download is required for USEARCH. Spack will
search your current directory for the download file. Alternatively, add
this file to a mirror so that Spack can find it. For instructions on how
to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
name: usearch

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
